sentences.english: The Nurburgring demands that kind of versatility .
sentences.chinese: 纽博格林需要这种全能性赛车。

sentences.english: No, it's not gonna work this time. Stop it. I'm serious, Boog.
sentences.chinese: 不行，这次不管用了停下来，我是认真的，博格。

sentences.english: The only way to save him is for Bogg to jump out after him and travel through time.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的办法救他是博格跳出来后，他和穿越时间。

sentences.english: And now, Bogdashevsky is training the psyches of a couple of wealthy foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 现在博格达什维斯基在为几个国外富翁做心理训练。

sentences.english: "I did not do it for financial gain, " Bergersen said, holding back tears.
sentences.chinese: “我这样做并非为了经济利益，”博格森忍住眼泪说。

sentences.english: We didn't run too many risks, except for that Erjon Bogdani header.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有承受很多险情，除了博格达尼的头球。

sentences.english: Then Patrik Berger got sick and I was in midfield.
sentences.chinese: 然后帕特里克博格生病了，我就出现在了中场。

sentences.english: “There’s a risk that these funds won’t appear,” Sundberg says.
sentences.chinese: “有一种风险就是这些资金不出现，”桑德博格说。

sentences.english: But on the plus side it was nice to see Yao abuse Bogut!
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面，能看到姚明虐博格特。

sentences.english: So you're taking us with you, right, Booger?
sentences.chinese: 那你会把我们都带走是吧，博格？

sentences.english: But the previous day, as rain fell, he had visited the site where Rosenberg was shot.
sentences.chinese: 但前一天，他冒雨查看了罗森博格遇害的地点。

sentences.english: My favourite players are Z4 and bergkamp.
sentences.chinese: 我最爱的球员是Z4和博格坎普。

sentences.english: Fred P. Hochberg – Chairman and President, Export-Import Bank of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 霍奇博格，美国进出口银行主席。

sentences.english: The day before the broadcast, he met with Rosenberg’s son Eduardo.
sentences.chinese: 播出的前一天，他会见了罗森博格的儿子爱德华多。
